Methods

setRule()

setRule(string $field, string $message, \Aura\Input\Closure $closure)

Sets a filter rule on a field.

Parameters

string $field

The field name.
string $message

The message when the rule fails.
\Aura\Input\Closure $closure

A closure that implements the rule. It must have the signature function ($value, &$fields); it must return boolean true on success, or boolean false on failure.

Tags

None found

values()

values(mixed $values) : bool

Filter (sanitize and validate) the data.

Parameters

mixed $values

The values to be filtered.

Returns

bool —

True if all rules passed; false if one or more failed.

Tags

None found

getMessages()

getMessages(string $field) : mixed

Gets the messages for all fields, or for a single field.

Parameters

string $field

If empty, return all messages for all fields; otherwise, return only messages for the named field.

Returns

mixed

Tags

None found

addMessages()

addMessages(string $field, string|array $messages) : void

Manually add messages to a particular field.

Parameters

string $field

Add to this field.
string|array $messages

Add these messages to the field.

None found
